00029 XGraphListConnector::XGraphListConnector(const shared_ptr<XGraphList> &node, Q3Table *item,
00030                                          QPushButton *btnnew, QPushButton *btndelete) :
00031     XListQConnector(node, item),
00032     m_graphlist(node),
00033     m_newGraph(createOrphan<XNode>("NewGraph", true)),
00034     m_deleteGraph(createOrphan<XNode>("DeleteGraph", true)),
00035     m_conNewGraph(xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_newGraph, btnnew)),
00036     m_conDeleteGraph(xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_deleteGraph, btndelete))
00037 {
00038     KIconLoader *loader = KIconLoader::global();
00039     btnnew->setIcon( loader->loadIcon("filenew",
00040                                                                                 KIconLoader::Toolbar, KIconLoader::SizeSmall, true ) );  
00041     btndelete->setIcon( loader->loadIcon("fileclose",
00042                                                                                    KIconLoader::Toolbar, KIconLoader::SizeSmall, true ) ); 
00043                
00044     connect(item, SIGNAL( clicked( int, int, int, const QPoint& )),
00045             this, SLOT(clicked( int, int, int, const QPoint& )) );
00046     m_pItem->setNumCols(4);
00047     const double def = 50;
00048     m_pItem->setColumnWidth(0, (int)(def * 2.0));
00049     m_pItem->setColumnWidth(1, (int)(def * 2.0));
00050     m_pItem->setColumnWidth(2, (int)(def * 2.0));
00051     m_pItem->setColumnWidth(3, (int)(def * 2.0));
00052     QStringList labels;
00053     labels += i18n("Name");
00054     labels += i18n("Axis X");
00055     labels += i18n("Axis Y");
00056     labels += i18n("Axis Z");
00057     m_pItem->setColumnLabels(labels);
00058 
00059     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(node->children());
00060     if(list) {  
00061         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = list->begin(); it != list->end(); it++)
00062             onCatch(*it);
00063     }
00064 
00065   
00066     m_lsnNewGraph = m_newGraph->onTouch().connectWeak(
00067         shared_from_this(), &XGraphListConnector::onNewGraph, XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00068     m_lsnDeleteGraph = m_deleteGraph->onTouch().connectWeak(
00069         shared_from_this(), &XGraphListConnector::onDeleteGraph, XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00070 }
00071 
00072 void
00073 XGraphListConnector::onNewGraph (const shared_ptr<XNode> &) {
00074     static int graphidx = 1;
00075     m_graphlist->createByTypename("", formatString("Graph-%d", graphidx++));
00076 }
00077 void
00078 XGraphListConnector::onDeleteGraph (const shared_ptr<XNode> &) {
00079     int n = m_pItem->currentRow();
00080     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(m_graphlist->children());
00081     if(list) {    
00082         if((n >= 0) && (n < (int)list->size())) {
00083             shared_ptr<XNode> node = list->at(n);
00084             m_graphlist->releaseChild(node);
00085         }
00086     }
00087 }
00088 void
00089 XGraphListConnector::clicked ( int row, int col, int, const QPoint& ) {
00090     switch(col) {
00091     case 0:
00092     {
00093         atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(m_graphlist->children());
00094         if(list) { 
00095             if((row >= 0) && (row < (int)list->size())) {
00096                 dynamic_pointer_cast<XValGraph>(list->at(row))->showGraph();
00097             }
00098         }
00099     }
00100     break;
00101     default:
00102         break;
00103     }
00104 }
00105 void
00106 XGraphListConnector::onRelease(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node)
00107 {
00108     for(tconslist::iterator it = m_cons.begin(); it != m_cons.end();)
00109     {
00110         if(it->node == node)
00111         {
00112             for(int i = 0; i < m_pItem->numRows(); i++)
00113             {
00114                 if(m_pItem->cellWidget(i, 1) == it->widget) m_pItem->removeRow(i);
00115             }
00116             it = m_cons.erase(it);
00117         }
00118         else
00119         {
00120             it++;
00121         }
00122     }
00123 }
00124 void
00125 XGraphListConnector::onCatch(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node)
00126 {
00127     shared_ptr<XValGraph> graph = dynamic_pointer_cast<XValGraph>(node);
00128     int i = m_pItem->numRows();
00129     m_pItem->insertRows(i);
00130     m_pItem->setText(i, 0, graph->getLabel().c_str());
00131 
00132     struct tcons con;
00133     con.node = node;
00134     QComboBox *cmbX = new QComboBox(m_pItem);
00135     con.conx = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(graph->axisX(), cmbX);
00136     m_pItem->setCellWidget(i, 1, cmbX);
00137     QComboBox *cmbY1 = new QComboBox(m_pItem);
00138     con.cony1 = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(graph->axisY1(), cmbY1);
00139     m_pItem->setCellWidget(i, 2, cmbY1);
00140     QComboBox *cmbZ = new QComboBox(m_pItem);
00141     con.conz = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(graph->axisZ(), cmbZ);
00142     m_pItem->setCellWidget(i, 3, cmbZ);
00143 
00144     con.widget = m_pItem->cellWidget(i, 1);
00145     m_cons.push_back(con);
00146 }
